name: Suicide Silence
description: '''Suicide Silence''' is an American [[deathcore]] band from [[Riverside, California|Riverside]], [[California]]. The band was established in 2002, and has released seven studio albums, three EPs, and nineteen music videos. They were awarded the ''[[Revolver (magazine)|Revolver]]'' Golden God award for "Best New Talent" in 2009. The group currently consists of guitarists Chris Garza and Mark Heylmun, bassist Dan Kenny, vocalist Hernan "Eddie" Hermida and drummer Ernie Iniguez.
